# Notebook general settings
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

# Set options and process data
```{r include=FALSE}
inputfile = "test/tests.xlsx"
worksheet = "auto_count"
experiment_finished = "auto"        # auto / yes / no

devtools::load_all("flies", reset=T)
result = flies::process(inputfile, worksheet, experiment_finished)
```

# Results

## Tally
```{r}
result$tally
```

## Graph
```{r}
flies::plot(result)
```
